schedule.strategy: Quality over quantity - build returning viewers through episodic series
schedule.posting_philosophy: 3 strategic posts per week aligned with data-proven content types

Tuesday.description: AI tool demonstrations with visual transformations
Tuesday.expected_behavior: High rewatch rate, reference content, save & share
Tuesday.historical_performance: 461.7% rewatch on Text-to-3D demo, 70% completion on Canva
Tuesday.reasoning: Tool demos are your BEST performers - Text-to-3D got 4.6x rewatches

Thursday.description: ChatGPT/AI prompt libraries - episodic numbered series
Thursday.expected_behavior: Episodic viewers return weekly, bookmark for reference
Thursday.reasoning: 'SECRET' hook + specific tool = proven 380 views, creates anticipation

Saturday.description: Curated AI news (ONLY stories with high-completion potential)
Saturday.expected_behavior: New viewer acquisition, occasional viral hits
Saturday.reasoning: News CAN work but ONLY with practical value - filter heavily
Saturday.quality_gate: Reject news without clear 'how this affects you' angle

tool_teardown_tuesday.hook_structure: Show visual transformation in first 3 seconds
tool_teardown_tuesday.cta: Next Tuesday: [Teaser for next tool]. Subscribe so you don't miss it!
examples: Tool Teardown Tuesday - Episode 5: Midjourney's SECRET Parameter Creates Perfect Images!
Tool Teardown Tuesday - Episode 6: Notion's HIDDEN AI Builds Your Workflow in 60 Seconds!

secret_prompts_thursday.title_template: ChatGPT SECRET Prompts - Episode [N]: [SPECIFIC USE CASE]!
secret_prompts_thursday.hook_structure: Episode number + immediate problem it solves
secret_prompts_thursday.cta: Episode [N+1] next Thursday reveals the [TEASER]! Subscribe now!
required_elements: Episode number MUST be in title
Specific use case (Email, Meetings, Content, etc.)
examples: SECRET PROMPTS - Episode 3: Email Mastery in SECONDS!
SECRET PROMPTS - Episode 4: Meeting Notes AUTOMATION!

ai_news_roundup.hook_structure: What changed + how it affects viewer TODAY
ai_news_roundup.cta: Follow for Tuesday's tool demo on [Related Tool]!
exclusion_criteria: NO 'failed products' or negative news (31.8% completion)
NO controversy without resolution (ChatGPT Suicide: 20 views)
NO vague 'AI trends' - must be SPECIFIC tool/feature
examples: Google's Gemini 2.0 Flash: YOUR Search Just Got 10x Smarter!
Samsung's Secret VR Headset: Changes YOUR Daily Workflow!

scheduling_notes.github_actions_reality: Delays of 0-120 minutes are normal and EXPECTED
scheduling_notes.window_strategy: 3-hour windows absorb delays while hitting target audience
scheduling_notes.time_zone_targeting: 15:00 UTC = 10:00 AM EST (late morning, high desktop usage)

why_these_days.tuesday: Historically your BEST day (16:00 slot was 'HIGHEST' priority in old schedule)
why_these_days.thursday: Mid-week, high engagement, builds anticipation for weekend
why_these_days.saturday: Weekend morning, different audience segment, new viewer acquisition

why_3_posts_not_17.solution: 3 posts/week = viewers can follow ALL episodes, build habits
why_3_posts_not_17.math: 3 quality posts at 70% completion > 17 mediocre posts at 40% completion

migration_plan.week_2: Episode 2 for all series - measure returning viewer %
migration_plan.week_3: Episode 3 - should see first uptick in regular viewers
migration_plan.week_4: Episode 4 - evaluate which series has highest retention
migration_plan.week_5_plus: Double down on best-performing series, adjust weakest
